name: Sureshot Glasses
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ *** Sureshot Glasses drop from Alien generals. But in case you're tired of farming them, there's a way to build them. *** #L "Wire Drawing Machine" "150917" #L "Personal Furnace" "150930" #L "Small Platinum Ingot" "151363" #L "Crystalline Disk" "253139" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Now it's time to put everything together: Small Platinum Ingot + Personal Furnace = #L "Liquid Platinum" "151361" Skills: | 3.8x ME based on QL | Liquid Platinum + Wire Drawing Machine = #L "Platinum Filigree Wire" "151360" Skills: | 5.5x ME, 1.8x Agility | Crystalline Disk + Platinum Filigree Wire = #L "Sureshot Glasses" "253183" Skills: | 5x EE,ME | At start of guide we said you'll need at least ql 100 Crystalline Disk. Why? Simply because Sureshot Glasses come in quality range of 100-300. Another thing to watch while making them is title requirement to wear (ql 100-119 for tlt1, 120-159 for tlt2, 160-199 for tlt3, 200-239 for tlt4, 240-279 for tlt5, 280+ for tlt6).
